name: Julie's Live Demonstration
description: Julie presents her work to an imaginary audience. Intro speech, 12s demo inflation, triumphant conclusion.

data.label: Intro Speech
data.message:
*Julie suddenly straightens up, smooths her lab coat, and addresses an empty corner of the room as though facing an auditorium*

"Ladies and gentlemen of the International Inflation Sciences Review Board — thank you for attending today's live demonstration!" *gestures grandly at [Player]* "What you see before you is Subject [Player], currently at mid-session pressure levels, exhibiting textbook accommodation response!"

*pulls up a chart on her tablet and holds it toward the empty chairs* "As outlined in my paper — 'Progressive Pressure Dynamics in Human Intestinal Elasticity' — the accommodation curve follows a stepped pattern rather than the linear model proposed by Henderson et al. Today, I will demonstrate this principle LIVE!"

*turns to [Player] with a conspiratorial whisper* Play along — this is going to look GREAT on my grant application.

data.label: Demo Inflation (12s)
data.preMessage:
*Julie addresses her imaginary audience with theatrical confidence* "Observe! I will now initiate a twelve-second sustained inflation. Note the real-time distension readings on the monitor — particularly the stepped accommodation response at seconds four, eight, and twelve!"

*turns to the equipment with a flourish* "Commencing demonstration inflation — NOW!"

data.label: Triumphant Conclusion
data.message:
*Julie spins back to face the empty room, arms spread triumphantly*

"AND THERE IT IS! Did you see the stepped response at the eight-second mark?! The accommodation curve CLEARLY shows a non-linear progression — exactly as my model predicted!" *points at her tablet screen* "Henderson's linear model would have predicted a smooth curve. What we got instead was a STAIRCASE! My hypothesis is CONFIRMED!"

*takes a bow to thunderous imaginary applause* "Thank you, thank you! I'll be publishing the full results in next quarter's Journal of Inflation Sciences! Questions can be directed to my lab email!"

*turns back to [Player], grinning ear to ear* That went PERFECTLY! I mean, the review board isn't technically here, but when they READ about this, they're going to lose their minds! *pats [Player]'s belly affectionately* And YOU were the star of the show!
